member.name: T:Dragonbones.Native.PrecisionTimer
member.summary: A precision timer used to profile functions

member.name: P:Dragonbones.Native.PrecisionTimer.Frequency
member.summary: The frequency which the timer runs on

member.name: P:Dragonbones.Native.PrecisionTimer.FrequencyF
member.summary: The frequency which the timer runs on

member.name: P:Dragonbones.Native.PrecisionTimer.Elapsed
member.summary: The total time elapsed as a timespan

member.name: P:Dragonbones.Native.PrecisionTimer.ElapsedSecondsF
member.summary: the amount of seconds elapsed in single precision floating point value

member.name: M:Dragonbones.Native.PrecisionTimer.Reset
member.summary: Stops timer and resets elapsed to zero

member.name: M:Dragonbones.Native.PrecisionTimer.Restart
member.summary: Stops timer, resets elapsed to zero, and starts timer anew
